mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `ss`.`comments`(article_index, user_email, content, created_at) VALUES (#{articleIndex},#{userEmail},#{content},#{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT `index` AS `index`, `article_index` AS `articleIndex`, `user_email` AS `userEmail`, `content` AS `content`, `created_at` AS `createdAt` FROM `ss`.`comments` WHERE `article_index` = #{articleIndex} ORDER BY `index` ASC
